name: Routable
headline: Simplifying payouts at scale
description: Routable’s secure B2B payments platform helps finance teams automate and simplify the payables process from invoice receipt to settlement. With support for your existing workflows and the flexibility to scale transactions from 100 to 100,000+, the platform was purpose-built to handle mass payouts reducing time spent on tedious tasks.

founders.name: Tom Harel, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Routable (S17). I love helping founders solve problems and build amazing businesses.

founders.name: Omri Mor, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Co-founder of Routable.
I spend most of my time listening to music or hanging out with my wife and two cats.

[Log in](https://routable.com/<https:/www.routablehq.com/login/>)[Request a demo](https://routable.com/</request-a-demo/>)
# Accounts payable automation, solved
Automate invoice processing and payments, onboard vendors seamlessly, customize approval flows, and more — for 30% less.
[Request a demo](https://routable.com/</request-a-demo/>)
![Fora Travel Logo White](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Fora-Travel-logo-white.svg)
![Remax Logo White](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Remax-Logo-White.svg)
![Ticketmaster Logo White](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Ticketmaster-Logo-White.svg)
![Vouch Logo White](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Vouch-logo-white.svg)
![Stratacomm Logo White](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Stratacomm-logo-white-1.svg)
![Prizepicks Logo White New](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Prizepicks-logo-white-new.svg)
![Ethos Logo White New](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Ethos-logo-white-new.svg)
![Veho Logo White](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Veho-logo-white.svg)
![Postal Logo White](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Postal-logo-white.svg)
![Dollar Icon Blue](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Dollar-Icon-Blue.svg)
## Faster payments for less
Pay hundreds of thousands of vendors around the world 2X faster and for 30% less than competitors.
![Workflow Icon Blue](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Workflow-Icon-Blue.svg)
## We work the way you work
You know your business best. Adapt workflows to perfectly mirror your company’s unique requirements.
![Circle Check Icon Blue](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Circle-Check-Icon-Blue.svg)
## Stress-free compliance and controls
Comply with internal controls and industry regulations with simplified processes and audit-ready data. 
## The complete AP automation platform for modern businesses
Accounts payable isn’t just a single click. It’s a comprehensive supply chain that requires a secure, streamlined solution.
### Automate your accounts payable
Invoice Capture
Eliminate manual invoice entry and create bills in seconds with Routable’s AI-powered OCR. 
[Explore→](https://routable.com/</features/invoice-capture-ocr/>)
Approval Workflows
Automate your approval process with workflows designed to fit your organization’s unique requirements.
[Explore→](https://routable.com/</features/approval-workflows/>)
Payment Reconciliation
Make payment reconciliation the easiest part of your month-end close with sophisticated tracking tools and real-time visibility. 
[Explore→](https://routable.com/</features/payment-reconciliation/>)
PO Matching
Built for 2-way and 3-way matching so you can save time, stay in sync, and prepare for audits.
[Explore→](https://routable.com/</features/po-matching/>)
Role-based Access Control
Transform your accounting tasks into streamlined, role-specific operations, elevating your team’s efficiency.
[Explore→](https://routable.com/</features/custom-roles/>)
Compliance
Reduce the cost of human error with the automated controls you need to mitigate risk and improve compliance.
[Explore→](https://routable.com/</features/compliance/>)
![Invoice Capture Accordion](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Invoice-Capture-Accordion.svg)
![Financial Flexibility](https://routable.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Froutable.wpenginepowered.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F07%2FFinancial-Flexibility.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
## Financial flexibility, complete control
![AICPA SOC Logo](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/AICPA-SOC-Logo.svg)![AICPA SOC 2 Logo](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/AICPA-SOC-2-Logo.svg)
Secure from the start, and throughout
We take a thorough, proactive, and transparent approach to security.
## Pay anyone, anywhere, on time
Make thousands of payments in a few clicks or via our API to 220+ countries and territories in 140+ currencies.
![Mass-Payouts-Slider-Visual](https://routable.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Froutable.wpenginepowered.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F07%2FMass-Payouts-Slider-Visual.png&w=3840&q=75)
Mass Payouts
Whether you make 100s or 1000s of monthly payments, Routable is designed to handle high-volume payouts.
[Explore→](https://routable.com/</features/mass-payments/>)
International Payments
Make international payments in as little as 1-3 business days, in 140+ currencies, to 220+ countries and territories around the world. 
[Explore→](https://routable.com/</features/international-payments/>)
CSV Payments
Send thousands of payments worldwide with a single CSV file upload. Efficient, secure, and designed for your growing business needs.
[Explore→](https://routable.com/</features/csv-payments/>)
## Expand your vendor base, without losing compliance
Improve every aspect of vendor management from seamless on-brand onboarding to new levels of tax filing accuracy.
Onboarding
Onboard, pay, and monitor vendors and contractors with Routable’s all-in-one Vendor Management System.
[Explore Onboarding→](https://routable.com/</features/onboarding/>)
Tax Management
![Tax Management Visual](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Tax-Management-Visual.svg)
Improve every aspect of vendor tax management. From requesting W-9 and W-8 tax forms to filing 1099s and 1042s.
[Explore Tax Management→](https://routable.com/</features/tax-management/>)
Vendor Compliance Checks
![Risk Checks Visual](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Risk-Checks-Visual.svg)
Mitigate fraud and financial risk exposure with compliance checks that vet and validate vendors and contractors before you pay.
[Explore Vendor Compliance Checks→](https://routable.com/</features/vendor-compliance-checks/>)
## Perfectly synced, every time. Experience a true two-way sync, with 99.8% accuracy.
![Oracle NetSuite Logo](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Oracle-NetSuite-Logo-1.svg)
Scale your enterprise business with Routable + NetSuite.
[See integration→](https://routable.com/</integrations/oracle-netsuite/>)
![Sage Logo](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Sage-Logo.svg)
Drive your business with Routable + Sage Intacct.
[See integration→](https://routable.com/</integrations/sage-intacct/>)
![QuickBooks Logo](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/QuickBooks-Logo.svg)
Save time and money with a real time, two-way sync.
[See integration→](https://routable.com/</integrations/quickbooks-online/>)
![Xero Logo](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Xero-Logo.svg)
Makes sending invoices and paying bills a breeze.
[See integration→](https://routable.com/</integrations/xero/>)
## Built for you, and your team
Controllers
Focus on your strategic role and simplify your AP/AR process.
[Learn more→](https://routable.com/</roles/controller/>)
CFOs
Lower operational costs and enable your team to deliver on targets.
[Learn more→](https://routable.com/</roles/cfo/>)
Accountants
Eliminate mundane tasks and scale in line with your client needs.
[Learn more→](https://routable.com/</roles/accountant/>)
Developers
Our Payments API makes it easy to send and receive business payments.
[Learn more→](https://routable.com/</roles/developer/>)
![Team Lifestyle](https://routable.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Froutable.wpenginepowered.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F06%2FTeam-Lifestyle.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
## The world’s most innovative finance teams scale with Routable
[![Customer Ethos Logo](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Customer-Ethos-Logo.svg)Ethos seamlessly scaled to over 8,000 bills created and payments remitted per monthRead more](https://routable.com/</customers/ethos/>)
![Decimal Testimonial Thumbnail](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Decimal-Testimonial-Thumbnail.svg)
> After testing 5+ different AP solutions, Routable was the clear winner. There's a long list of reasons why: better QuickBooks Online sync, user experience, vendor onboarding experience, quality and timeliness of customer support, their product roadmap and velocity – it's just the best solution we've found.
Matt TaitCEO @ Decimal
[![Hotplate Logo](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Hotplate-Logo.svg)Hotplate efficiently manages their AP volume with RoutableRead more](https://routable.com/</customers/hotplate/>)
> Routable's API has saved our team countless hours by automating thousands of outgoing payments every year. Our partners couldn't be happier with the quality of service we're now able to provide - and it's only possible because of Routable.
David McKaySeated, Co-founder and CEO
[![Garmentory Logo](https://routable.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/garmentory-Logo.svg)Garmentory saves countless hours with RoutableRead more](https://routable.com/</customers/garmentory/>)

## Automated AP, seamless vendor onboarding, approval flows, and more
[![ap_automation_101.webp](https://routable.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Froutable.wpenginepowered.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F08%2Fap_automation_101.webp&w=3840&q=75)AP Automation 101: Streamlining your Accounts Payable processArticles](https://routable.com/</resources/ap-automation-101/>)[![Guide Everything About XB V2](https://routable.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Froutable.wpenginepowered.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F08%2FGuide_Everything-About-XB__v2.webp&w=3840&q=75)Everything you need to know about international B2B paymentsGuides & Research Reports](https://routable.com/</resources/international-payments/>)[![photo-1463680942456-e4230dbeaec7.jpg](https://routable.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Froutable.wpenginepowered.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F08%2Fphoto-1463680942456-e4230dbeaec7.jpg&w=3840&q=75)The benefits of a real-time, two-way syncArticles](https://routable.com/</resources/the-benefits-of-a-real-time-two-way-sync/>)[![photo-1531497865144-0464ef8fb9a9.jpg](https://routable.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Froutable.wpenginepowered.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2024%2F08%2Fphoto-1531497865144-0464ef8fb9a9.jpg&w=3840&q=75)The importance of invoice approval workflowsArticles](https://routable.com/</resources/invoice-approval-process/>)

generated_description:
Routable is a fintech company founded in 2017 and based in San Francisco. It emerged from the Y Combinator Batch S17, and it has grown to a team of around 160 employees. The mission is straightforward yet powerful: they aim to simplify payouts at scale. 

At its core, Routable provides a secure B2B payments platform that streamlines the accounts payable process, making it easy for finance teams to handle everything from invoice receipt to payment settlement. This isn’t just about convenience; it's about scaling effectively, allowing businesses to manage transactions ranging from a mere 100 to an astonishing 100,000+ efficiently. By automating tedious tasks, Routable saves companies time and ultimately, money—claiming they can reduce costs by 30% compared to competitors. 

The key features of Routable’s platform include:
- **Automated invoice processing** using AI-powered OCR, making manual entry obsolete.
- **Customizable approval workflows** tailored to the unique needs of businesses.
- **Mass payouts** capabilities, facilitating payments to hundreds of thousands of vendors quickly and securely.
- Strong compliance measures to ensure that companies meet internal controls and industry regulations, providing audit-ready data.

Routable also offers various solutions for different sectors, including marketplaces, nonprofits, and the gig economy, showing their versatility in catering to diverse business models. Their technology integrates seamlessly with popular accounting platforms like QuickBooks, Xero, and NetSuite, enabling user-friendly experiences for finance teams.

Notably, the platform emphasizes international payments, supporting transactions in over 140 currencies and more than 220 territories, making it an attractive option for companies with global operations. 

Their leadership includes Dalton Caldwell, who serves as a Group Partner, guiding the company's strategic vision. If you’re interested in learning more about their offerings or wish to see them in action, they provide demos and have an extensive resource library on their website. 

In summary, Routable is not just about processing payments; it's about transforming how businesses manage their financial operations, allowing them to focus more on growth and less on the complexities of accounts payable. For more information, visit their [website](https://routable.com).
